title-group.article-title: Cost of Capital with Flotation Costs

abstract.p: A zero net present value project is one whose acceptance does not affect share price. Based upon the above invariance property and the assumption the firm maintains constant capital structure weights, this article derives a formula for the cost of capital with flotation costs. It is shown that other widely used methods do not possess the invariance property and, consequently, could lead to incorrect capital budgeting decisions.
